name: Cat Runner - Online Rush
description:
Cat Runner-Online Rush is an exciting free endless running game for all ages especially for the boys and girls. Choose your loved pet and dash your way in the subway.

Bring your Favorite pet, running cat, dog, to get fun in city park, forest. Run, slide, jump. Take care of the bus or train that comes rushing. Sprint forward as quickly as possible, collect coins to upgrade you pet and get powerful items.

It is easy to control your character, only to tilt your phone, run left or right to avoid the obstacle. Rush in the subway avoid the coming train, or bus on the city. Differ scene to run of the cat run game. Run as fast as you can with fast speed to achieve the #1 number.

Competing mode is very exciting and fun, Racing with world players, observe the prize after competing. Run with your friends and get more happiest in our game.


Crazy animal Endless RunFeatures:
-Endless run game
-Subway & bus scene to rush
-More role of pet to choose
-Get more and more coins
-Run as fast as with high speed
-Play with your friends in the competing mode
-Beautiful background
-Suitable for all ages

Run with your friends in the subway & bus scene, get more happy!


Cat Runner - Online Rush Subscription Terms:
- Remove ads and vip exclusive benefits per day for one week is $2.99 USD per week.
- All prices are subject to change without notification. We occasionally run promotion prices as incentives or limited time opportunities for qualifying purchases made during the promotional time period. Due to the time sensitive and promotional nature of these events, we are unable to offer price protection or retroactive discounts or refunds for previous purchases in the event of a price reduction or promotional offering.

- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package.

- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged. Please visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 for more information.

- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.

-When you cancel the subscription,all the privilege you are entitled to will be invalid

- Any unused portion of a free trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
